tier_1_determinative.sexual_act_description: Forcibly raped the victim, an 8-year-old girl, causing bleeding injury.
tier_1_determinative.absence_of_consent: Victim was lured and forcibly raped.

tier_2_material.aggravated_circumstances_of_rape: The victim was a minor (8 years old), and the act involved a position of trust (private tutor).

tier_3_contextual.time_of_reporting: Reported on 08.05.2018; delay not explained in detail.

tier_4_procedural.case_title: Abbas Sk. @ Abbas Hossain Vs. State of West Bengal

residual_details.additional_facts: The appellant was convicted under Section 376(3) of IPC and Section 6 of the POCSO Act. The forensic report did not find semen or spermatozoa on the victim's clothing or swabs. There were contradictions in witness testimonies and the forensic evidence did not support the prosecution's case.
